alert.note: Alert for South Central Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 23 at 2:48AM MST until January 24 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations ranging between 4 and 10 inches across the area. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...South Central Mountains. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to Noon MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Tire chains may be necessary if traveling through mountain passes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.
